verses.verse: The oracle <S%H9294><s%> of Nineveh. <S%H5210><s%> The book <S%H5612><s%> of the vision <S%H2377><s%> of Nahum <S%H5151><s%> the Elkoshite. <S%H512><s%>

A jealous <S%H7072><s%> and avenging <S%H5358><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is avenging <S%H5358><s%> and wrathful. <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2534><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> takes <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5358><s%> on His adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And He reserves <S%H5201><s%> wrath <S%H2534><s%> for His enemies. <S%H340><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> in power, <S%H3581><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will by no <S%H3808><s%> means <S%H5352><s%> leave <S%H5352><s%> [the guilty] unpunished. <S%H5352><s%> In whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> and storm <S%H8183><s%> is His way, <S%H1870><s%> And clouds <S%H6051><s%> are the dust <S%H80><s%> beneath His feet. <S%H7272><s%>

He rebukes <S%H1605><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> and makes <S%H3001><s%> it dry; <S%H3001><s%> He dries <S%H9162><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> the rivers. <S%H5104><s%> Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and Carmel <S%H3760><s%> wither; <S%H535><s%> The blossoms <S%H6525><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> wither. <S%H535><s%>

Mountains <S%H2022><s%> quake <S%H7493><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of Him, And the hills <S%H1389><s%> dissolve; <S%H4127><s%> Indeed the earth <S%H776><s%> is upheaved <S%H5375><s%> by His presence, <S%H6440><s%> The world <S%H8398><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> in it.

Who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> His indignation <S%H2195><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> can endure <S%H6965><s%> the burning <S%H2740><s%> of His anger <S%H639><s%>? His wrath <S%H2534><s%> is poured <S%H5413><s%> out like fire, <S%H784><s%> And the rocks <S%H6697><s%> are broken <S%H5422><s%> up by Him.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good, <S%H2896><s%> A stronghold <S%H4581><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> And He knows <S%H3045><s%> those who take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him.

But with an overflowing <S%H5674><s%> flood <S%H7858><s%> He will make <S%H6213><s%> a complete <S%H3617><s%> end <S%H3617><s%> of its site, <S%H4725><s%> And will pursue <S%H7291><s%> His enemies <S%H340><s%> into darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

Whatever <S%H4100><s%> you devise <S%H2803><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He will make <S%H6213><s%> a complete <S%H3617><s%> end <S%H3617><s%> of it. Distress <S%H6869><s%> will not rise <S%H6965><s%> up twice. <S%H6471><s%>

Like <S%H5704><s%> tangled <S%H5440><s%> thorns, <S%H9359><s%> And like those who are drunken <S%H9352><s%> with their drink, <S%H5435><s%> They are consumed <S%H398><s%> As stubble <S%H7179><s%> completely <S%H4392><s%> withered. <S%H3002><s%>
From you has gone <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> One who plotted <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> A wicked <S%H1100><s%> counselor. <S%H3289><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Though <S%H518><s%> they are at full <S%H8003><s%> [strength] and likewise <S%H3651><s%> many, <S%H7227><s%> Even so, <S%H3651><s%> they will be cut <S%H1494><s%> off <S%H1494><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> away. <S%H5674><s%> Though I have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> you, I will afflict <S%H6031><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> longer. <S%H5750><s%>
"So now, <S%H6258><s%> I will break <S%H7665><s%> his yoke <S%H4132><s%> bar <S%H4132><s%> from upon you, And I will tear <S%H5423><s%> off <S%H5423><s%> your shackles. <S%H4147><s%>"

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has issued <S%H6680><s%> a command <S%H6680><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you: "Your name <S%H8034><s%> will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be perpetuated. <S%H2232><s%> I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> idol <S%H6459><s%> and image <S%H4541><s%> From the house <S%H1004><s%> of your gods. <S%H430><s%> I will prepare <S%H7760><s%> your grave, <S%H6913><s%> For you are contemptible. <S%H7043><s%>"

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him who brings <S%H1319><s%> good news, <S%H1319><s%> Who announces <S%H8085><s%> peace! <S%H7965><s%> Celebrate <S%H2287><s%> your feasts, <S%H2282><s%> O Judah; <S%H3063><s%> Pay <S%H9608><s%> your vows. <S%H5088><s%> For never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> will the wicked <S%H1100><s%> one pass <S%H5674><s%> through you; He is cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> completely. <S%H3605><s%>
